Washes well.']}, "Men's Park Short Sleeve T Shirt": {'price': 25.72, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P032', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['Very good quality shirt soft and comfortable!', "Fast shipping, good quality. I'm an XL in Nike and Adidas; however, this XL is a bit tight on me. The colors are very pretty.", 'I love these Nike shirts! The material is excellent quality — not too thin, not too thick, just the right weight. They keep cool and comfortable, which makes them perfect for my fiancé whether he’s working outdoors or heading to the kids’ sporting events. Versatile, breathable, and stylish. Definitely a great buy for the price!', 'A mi hijo le gustò esa playera.', 'Muy lindos y buena calidad la tela maravillosa coinciden las talla lo recomiendo 1010.', 'So I bought a “new” shirt. Fit is perfect and it looks great. The shirt was delivered without any tags and smelled like body odor. I ordered four and the other three smelled fine and did have the tags. It’s pretty obvious that this was a returned shirt that someone didn’t want and was purchased as new from me.']}, 'Nike Youth Park VII Short Sleeve Jersey, BV6742-010': {'price': 28.97, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P033', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ['Great quality shirts! My son loved them, and I would definitely purchase them again.', 'Love this shirt !!! Great panel back. Shirt holds it color.', 'Nicer than I expected. The Nike check is embroidered not just a vinyl. I will say the shirt is different than the Nike pro dri fit shirts but still a great shirt my son loves it.', 'My teen is pretty picky with the shorts he wears. The size was perfect. The soft gray color and quality fabric are a nice addition to the shirts he will wear. I bought it for the value for the money and the bonus was the breathabilty of the shirt. He asked me what other colors he could get it in next.']}, 'Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch, M3 Pro Chip (16-core CPU, 40-core GPU)': {'price': 1999.99, 'brand': 'Apple', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P034', 'rating': 4.9, 'reviews': ['The performance is simply breathtaking. I can render complex 4K projects in half the time it took on my previous Intel Mac. The Space Black finish is sleek and surprisingly resistant to fingerprints.', 'Best laptop screen I have ever seen. The 120Hz ProMotion makes everything feel butter-smooth, and the battery life actually lasts a full workday even with heavy Lightroom use.', 'It is a massive investment, but for professional video work, it pays for itself in saved time. The speakers are also surprisingly deep and clear for a laptop.']}, 'ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025) GA605': {'price': 2545.0, 'brand': 'ASUS', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P035', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ["If you're looking for a 'MacBook for gamers,' this is the perfect choice.
